text.tspan: Consumption-based COâ‚‚ emissions per capita vs. Human

Consumption-based emissions
are measured in tonnes per person. The Human Development Index (HDI) is a summary
measure of key dimensions of human development: a long and healthy life, a good education, and a decent standard of
Data source: Global Carbon Budget (2024); Population based on various sources (2024); UNDP, Human Development Report (2025)
